title: 196 - Mitt’s GROUNDED
description: Today’s episode of The POD kicks off with a full hause of characters discussing how in the world Mitt finding out in the worst way his mothers credit card was linked to his Xbox account. With the rather candid start The boys then jump into the POD Fod, which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Today’s FOD includes Kanye’s new crib, Vin vs. The Rock, the worlds tallest ever man, and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
